validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters

layout.tagline: Design your dream furniture with AI
layout.body: Pick a style, customize every detail, and watch your vision come to life — all in minutes.

hero.headline: Design Your Perfect Furniture in Minutes
hero.subtitle: Upload your room, choose a style — watch AI transform it. Then customize with real-time pricing.
hero.roomDescription: Upload a photo — AI redesigns your room

features.heading: Everything you need to design with confidence
features.subheading: No design background required. Our system guides you from blank canvas to finished design.
features.customizableDescription: Choose from 8 furniture types with dozens of color, material, size, and finish combinations. Every detail is yours to control.
features.aiPreviewsDescription: Your selections are turned into a photorealistic prompt and rendered by AI — see your furniture before you buy it.
features.pricingDescription: Every option you choose updates the price instantly. Red velvet? +$80. Leather? +$200. No hidden costs, ever.

howItWorks.heading: Three steps to your dream furniture
howItWorks.subheading: From idea to photorealistic render — the entire process takes under two minutes.
howItWorks.step1Description: Choose from sofa, bed, dining table, desk, wardrobe, and more. Eight categories to start from.
howItWorks.step2Description: Select color, material, leg style, and size. Watch the price update live as you make each choice.
howItWorks.step3Description: Hit "Generate Design" and receive a photorealistic rendering of your custom furniture within seconds.

presets.heading: Start from a curated design
presets.subheading: Skip the choices — pick a designer preset and customize from there.
presets.emptyBody: Curated presets will appear here once the catalog is live.

gallery.heading: Delivered to real homes
gallery.subheading: Every piece you see was designed through Atlas and delivered to a customer in Georgia.

testimonials.heading: What our customers say
testimonials.subheading: Real stories from real homes across Georgia.
testimonials.quote1: We ordered a custom walnut dining table for our Tbilisi apartment. It arrived in exactly 3 weeks, assembled and ready. The quality is outstanding — far better than anything we found in stores.
testimonials.quote2: The AI preview matched the final product almost exactly. I was skeptical at first, but the linen sofa we received was perfect for our Batumi holiday home. Delivery and setup were seamless.
testimonials.quote3: I customized a wardrobe with specific dimensions and materials. The team confirmed everything within 2 hours and delivered on schedule. Exceptional white-glove service from start to finish.

reimagineCTA.heading: Reimagine Your Room with AI
reimagineCTA.body: Upload a photo of your kitchen, living room, or bedroom — and watch AI transform it into a completely new design. New furniture, new style, new vibe.

process.heading: What happens after you order
process.subheading: You always know exactly where your furniture is in the process — from quote to delivery.
process.step1Description: Submit your design and contact details. We confirm your order and production timeline within 2 hours.
process.step2Description: Expert craftsmen build your piece to exact specifications. Production takes 2–3 weeks depending on complexity.
process.step3Description: Every piece is inspected against your confirmed design before leaving the workshop. No exceptions.
process.step4Description: White-glove delivery to any city in Georgia. Our team assembles and positions your furniture — you just enjoy it.

faq.heading: Frequently asked questions
faq.subheading: Everything you need to know before placing your order.
faq.a1: Standard delivery takes 3 weeks from order confirmation. Complex custom pieces may take up to 4 weeks. We send you a precise timeline within 2 hours of your order.
faq.q2: Can I modify my design after ordering?
faq.a2: Minor modifications (color, finish) are possible within the first 24 hours at no extra cost. Structural changes after production begins may incur additional fees and time.
faq.a3: We work with solid oak, walnut, birch, and MDF for painted pieces. Upholstery options include linen, velvet, boucle, and full-grain leather. All wood is responsibly sourced.
faq.q4: Do you deliver outside the capital?
faq.a4: Yes. We deliver to 12 cities across Georgia including Tbilisi, Batumi, Kutaisi, Rustavi, Gori, and Zugdidi. White-glove assembly is included for all cities at no additional cost.
faq.q5: What if I am not satisfied with the result?
faq.a5: We stand behind every piece. If the delivered furniture does not match the confirmed design specifications, we will repair or replace it at no cost. Customer satisfaction is our guarantee.
faq.q6: Is the AI preview exactly what I will receive?
faq.a6: The AI preview is a photorealistic representation of your design choices — not a photograph of the final piece. Slight variations in wood grain and fabric texture are natural. The dimensions, colors, and materials are guaranteed to match your confirmed order.

modeSelect.heading: What would you like to do?
modeSelect.scratchDescription: Pick a furniture type, customize colors and materials, and generate photorealistic AI renders.
modeSelect.reimagineDescription: Upload a photo of your room and transform it with AI — new furniture, new style, new vibe.

categorySelect.subheading: Select the type of furniture you'd like to design
categorySelect.errorLoad: Failed to load categories. Please try again.
categorySelect.helperText: Select a category to continue to customization

roomUpload.heading: Upload Your Room
roomUpload.subheading: Upload a photo of your room and we'll place your configured furniture in it

customize.heading: Customize your {name}
customize.subheading: Each selection shapes your final design and price

roomCustomize.uploadFirst: Please upload a room photo first.
roomCustomize.configureDescription: Configure your {name} and describe placement below
roomCustomize.heading: Configure & Place your {name}
roomCustomize.subheading: Customize your furniture and tell us where to place it in your room
roomCustomize.placementPlaceholder: e.g., Place the sofa against the left wall, facing the window. Center it between the two side tables.
roomCustomize.placementHint: Describe where the furniture should appear in your room photo

result.completePrevious: Please complete the previous steps first.
result.noCreditsBody: Purchase credits to generate AI images of your design

stepIndicator.videoDescription: Generate a video of your furniture design with realistic motion and lighting. This feature is currently under development.

modeSelect.title: What would you like to create?
modeSelect.subtitle: Choose your path — design new furniture or transform an existing room.
modeSelect.hint: Pick a path to begin. You can always start over.

step1.title: Choose your furniture type.
step1.subtitle: Pick what you want to design — sofa, bed, desk, and more.
step1.tip3: AI render generated at the end
step1.hint: Tap any card to select it, then hit Continue.

step2.title: Customize the details.
step2.subtitle: Choose colors, materials, and finishes. Price updates instantly.
step2.tip3: Each option shapes the AI prompt
step2.hint: Select at least one option to unlock Generate.

step3.title: Your AI render is ready.
step3.subtitle: Review your design, save it, or bring it to life with a video.
step3.tip3: Generate a video on the next step
step3.hint: Love it? Save the image or hit Generate Video.

step4.title: Bring your design to life.
step4.subtitle: Pick a scene style and animation — we'll render a cinematic video.
step4.hint: Select a scene style, then pick a motion to generate.

step1.title: Upload your room photo.
step1.subtitle: Take a photo of the room you want to transform.
step1.tip1: JPEG, PNG, or WebP up to 10MB
step1.hint: Upload a clear, well-lit photo for best results.

step2.title: Choose your transformation.
step2.subtitle: Select what to change and pick a design style.
step2.hint: Pick a mode and style, then hit Reimagine Room.

step3.title: Your room, reimagined.
step3.subtitle: Compare before and after with the interactive slider.
step3.hint: Love it? Download the result or try another style.
